title: coinXpool
author: coinXpool
created_time: July 28, 2022, 05:24:52 PMLast edit: September 14, 2022, 02:45:53 AM by coinXpool
content: coin X pool is a recent mining pool that allows you to extract coins from various wallets, it is based on Yiimp fork.https://coinxpool.com/images/logo-home-350.pngIt has been running since March 1, 2022.A server STRATUM located in EU & AS. I was testing and mining it to see the bugs and I'm sure they still have that's why I didn't say it beforeWebsite https://coinXpool.comStratum protocol for miningcan be mined in SHARED or SOLOShared mining also available with a low 0.5% fee.Solo mining also available with a 1.0% fee.Variable mining difficulty with automatic adjustment*Use the ports mentioned in each currencyExample of Stratum Information for the coin VKAXVKAX EU-Germany StratumCode:-a mike -o stratum+tcp://eu.coinXpool.com:4294 -u YOUR-WALLET-ADDRESS.001 -p c=VKAXVKAX AS-Asia StratumCode:-a mike -o stratum+tcp://as.coinXpool.com:4294 -u YOUR-WALLET-ADDRESS.001 -p c=VKAXI'm improving it day by day :-)ADDED more coins:VKAXYERBJGCand more.....What is the COIN that are most sought after? I can add it :-)Welcome to those who want to try my pool and THANK YOU in advance!

comments.author: coinXpool
comments.body: Hi, I'm looking for the kawpow sratum for yiimp.They gave me one from barrystyle for yiimp that works with t-rex & gminer,but this STRATUM fails, it can't find any block, so I won't post it...I only give clients something that really works!!! gains for all!so if anyone knows any help for kawpow or fix barrystyle here is the github urlhttps://github.com/barrystyle/yiimp-kawpowthanks in advance
